items.name: Home Full Body - No Equipment
items.description: Effective full-body workout requiring no equipment. Perfect for home training.

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.notes: Keep core tight, lower chest to floor. Modify on knees if needed.

exercises.name: Bodyweight Squats
exercises.notes: Sit back like sitting in a chair, keep weight in heels.

exercises.name: Pike Push-ups
exercises.notes: Form an inverted V with your body, lower head toward floor.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.notes: Step forward, lower back knee toward floor. Keep front knee over ankle.

exercises.name: Superman Hold
exercises.notes: Lie face down, lift arms and legs off ground, squeeze glutes.

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.notes: Maintain plank position while driving knees to chest alternately.

exercises.name: Glute Bridges
exercises.notes: Squeeze glutes at top, don't hyperextend lower back.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.notes: Keep body in straight line from head to heels.

items.progression: Add reps each week. Progress to harder variations (e.g., diamond push-ups, jump squats).
